main event: An observer reported seeing a second magnitude object emitting yellowish-white light moving southward at Clark Air Force Base.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for about 12 minutes,The object was seen at 2345 LST on a clear bright night with third moonlight,No unusual activity or air traffic was reported during the sighting,The object made sweeps along the southern constellation down to 5 degrees elevation,Reported by F.J. Everson and other military personnel.
sighted object: an object of second magnitude emitting yellowish-white light
location: Clark Air Force Base, USAF Philippines
